docs.snippet: Although the number of voyages completed by ships of the Moore-McCormack Lines fleet dropped approximately 16 per cent during last year, as compared to 1947, the total was nevertheless about 80 per cent above that of 1940, which was the last full...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although the number of voyages completed by ships of the Moore-McCormack Lines fleet dropped approximately 16 per cent during last year, as compared to 1947, the total was nevertheless about 80 per cent above that of 1940, which was the last full year of operation before this country entered the war, according to statistics compiled by the company.
docs.abstract: Moore-McCormack rept for '48 shows 16% drop since '47 but gain over '40

headline.main: MOORE-M'CORMACK REPORTS FOR YEAR; Fewer Voyages and Less Cargo Compared to '47 -- Gain Shown Over Pre-War Level

docs.snippet: As a reflection of the listless trading in the foreign exchange market last week the small business involved came up with only minor prices changes. In particular, this applied to the Europeans, which ruled firmly. In the South American group,...
docs.lead_paragraph: As a reflection of the listless trading in the foreign exchange market last week the small business involved came up with only minor prices changes. In particular, this applied to the Europeans, which ruled firmly. In the South American group, however, there was some stir originating out of the rumors of currency devaluation.

docs.snippet: The Cunard White Star Line has adopted an unusual light green hull paint for the new liner Caronia and apparently is determined to preserve it as long as possible, it was apparent from the elaborate precautions taken during the berthing of the vessel...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard White Star Line has adopted an unusual light green hull paint for the new liner Caronia and apparently is determined to preserve it as long as possible, it was apparent from the elaborate precautions taken during the berthing of the vessel last week.

docs.snippet: The treatment and trial of Cardinal Mindszenty by the Hungarian Government is another example of Communist attempts to suppress religion, Juan Pablo Lojendio, Spanish Minister to Uruguay, said yesterday upon his arrival at La Guardia Airport, on a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The treatment and trial of Cardinal Mindszenty by the Hungarian Government is another example of Communist attempts to suppress religion, Juan Pablo Lojendio, Spanish Minister to Uruguay, said yesterday upon his arrival at La Guardia Airport, on a Trans-World Airline plane from Madrid. He was en route to his post in Montevideo.
docs.abstract: Min Lojendio compares Communist persecution of clergy during Civil War to Mindszenty case in Hungary

headline.main: MINDSZENTY TRIAL LIKENED TO SPAIN; Spanish Minister to Uruguay Recalls Red Tactics in Civil War -- Protests Continue

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES. SINCE August, 1947, when delegates of nineteen nations gathered at Rio de Janeiro to draft a treaty of mutual defense and assistance, governments have fallen in Ecuador, Peru, Venezuela and Paraguay. In Colombia, one of the most swift...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES. SINCE August, 1947, when delegates of nineteen nations gathered at Rio de Janeiro to draft a treaty of mutual defense and assistance, governments have fallen in Ecuador, Peru, Venezuela and Paraguay. In Colombia, one of the most swift and savage revolts in the history of this hemisphere made a shambles of an Inter-American Conference.

headline.main: Beneath the Ferment in Latin America; Intensified hunger and misery, after a long unrest, are shaking the props of a continent. Beneath the Ferment in Latin America Revolts in Latin America Since V-J Day.

docs.snippet: JERUSALEM, Feb. 14 -- Israel's first Constituent Assembly was formed today with rejoicing, tears and the heat of debate. The tears were hardly dry after a moving address by Dr. Chaim Weizmann, Provisional President, when the deputies launched into...
docs.lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM, Feb. 14 -- Israel's first Constituent Assembly was formed today with rejoicing, tears and the heat of debate. The tears were hardly dry after a moving address by Dr. Chaim Weizmann, Provisional President, when the deputies launched into the battle for power.
docs.abstract: US, Brit and French reprs fail to attend Israeli Assembly opening to avoid implied recognition of Israeli claim to city

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Feb. 16 (UP) -- Steel industrialists from the United States have encountered difficulties in their plans to develop Brazilian manganese deposits and may turn to Africa for new sources of the mineral, authoritative United States...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Feb. 16 (UP) -- Steel industrialists from the United States have encountered difficulties in their plans to develop Brazilian manganese deposits and may turn to Africa for new sources of the mineral, authoritative United States sources disclosed today.
docs.abstract: Brazilian development of Matto Grosso may force US steel mfrs to seek African deposits
